coursedetails.name: HTML
coursedetails.descriptionHeadings: Learn to build websites with HTML , CSS Bootstrap , Javascript , jQuery , Python 3 , and Django!
descriptionSubHeading: Create a fully functional web site using the Full-Stack with Django 1.11
Learn how to use HTML to create website content
Use CSS to create beautifully styled sites
